column4: I don't know if this goes here, but is this X-chat client truely free and open source? I installed the windows version in windows and now it is asking me to pay :\
however it lists as free/open source in the add/remove manager :P
Does that have anything to do with Ubuntu?  If you're asking about a windows program then ##windows would be the more appropriate place to ask.
But you aren't running Ubuntu, you're running Windows.
If anywhere, #xchat or ##windows would be the proper place to ask, it is offtopic for #ubuntu
